author: henning
msg: -  Add some docs about how the site is built to the README.txt file. The site
is now self-contained, it is no longer necessary to check out all other
db projects.
- change the reactor build to run inside the projects directory.
- Add some sorting code making sure that the projects will always appear
in natural sorting order
- Read the committers (developers) from all the sub-projects, eliminating
duplicates for the whoweare.xml template

author: henning
msg: - Add a LICENSE.txt file and the maven-license-plugin to the project.xml
file. Now that the reports list is no longer empty, we don't run all
the (unnecessary) projects reports but just a (very short) license
plugin. Yes I don't understand either why you can't turn off all reports
by just leaving the reports list empty...
- Move our dependencies to released versions to avoid SNAPSHOT reloading
- Fix up lots of the references in the POM which has been obviously copied
over from the maven project
- Move the list of PMC members from the whoweare.xml file here (into
the "developers" list)

author: henning
msg: Add the mockup POMs for the various DB subprojects. For the projects
using maven _and_ subversion, this will become an external reference
once we move the site module to Subversion.

author: henning
msg: Ignore all Velocity generated logs

author: jmcnally
msg: the chair is selected by the board
